item.title: RAID(Redundant Array of Independent Disks)
item.description: 종류 RAID 0 : stripping RAID 1 : mirroring RAID 5 : stripping + mirroring + parity (at least 3 disks) RAID 6 : stripping + mirroring + parity (at least 4 disks) RAID 0 + 1 : mirroring after stripping RAID 10 (1 + 0) : stripping after mirroring Benchmark SSD 에서의 밴치마크 : https://www.phoronix.com/scan.php?page=article&item=linux55-ssd-raid&num=1 RAID 5 기준으로 작성 다른 RAID 같은 경우 위 링크 참조 | | Btrfs | EXT4 | F2FS | XFS | |———————————————————————————–|——————-|—————–|——–|——–| | Application Start-up Time v3.
